item.title: it@cork Leader Awards
item.description: This is such a great idea. On November 1, 2007 it@cork will have their first ever Leaderâ€™s Awards. They want to recognise some of the leading companies and individuals in the community and have an evening of networking, reflection and celebration. There are 4 categories: 1. Emerging Company Award - to recognise a leading company in early stage business planning and execution 2. High Potential Award - to recognise a leading established company driving forward in international markets 3.
